name: Amoonguss
author: MAHOU
flavor_text: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.

abilities.name: Bursting Spores
abilities.effect: Whenever you play a Pokémon that has the Spore attack from your hand during your turn, you may leave your opponent’s Active Pokémon Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 70 more damage.
